com.algolia.instantsearch.helpers

Class Highlighter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.algolia.instantsearch.helpers.Highlighter

  • public class Highlighter
extends Object
    Renders HTML-like attributed strings into `Spannable` instances suitable for display.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Highlighter(String regexp)
      Constructor for a custom highlighter, using a custom regexp.
      Highlighter(String prefixTag, String postfixTag)
      Constructor for a custom highlighter, using prefix and postfix tags.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Highlighter

        public Highlighter(String regexp)
        Constructor for a custom highlighter, using a custom regexp.
        Parameters:
        regexp - a capturing RegExp regexp to find and capture the part to highlight.

      • Highlighter

        public Highlighter(String prefixTag,
                   String postfixTag)
        Constructor for a custom highlighter, using prefix and postfix tags.
        Parameters:
        prefixTag - the String that is inserted before a highlighted part of a result.
        postfixTag - the String that is inserted after a highlighted part of a result.

    • Method Detail

      • getDefault

        public static Highlighter getDefault()
        Get the default highlighter.
        Returns:
        an Highlighter matching anything between <em> and </em>.

      • setDefault

        public static void setDefault(@NonNull
                              String regexp)
        Set the default highlighter to highlight the captured group of the given RegExp regexp.
        Parameters:
        regexp - a capturing RegExp regexp to find and capture the part to highlight.

      • setDefault

        public static void setDefault(String prefixTag,
                              String postfixTag)
        Set the default highlighter to highlight anything between prefixTag and postfixTag.
        Parameters:
        prefixTag - the String that is inserted before a highlighted part of a result.
        postfixTag - the String that is inserted after a highlighted part of a result.

      • renderHighlightColor

        @Nullable
public Spannable renderHighlightColor(@NonNull
                                                JSONObject result,
                                                String attributeName,
                                                @ColorRes
                                                int colorId,
                                                @NonNull
                                                Context context)
        Render a highlighted result's attribute using a color resource.
        Parameters:
        result - JSONObject describing a hit.
        attributeName - name of the attribute to be highlighted.
        colorId - a resource Id referencing a color.
        context - a Context to get resources from.
        Returns:
        a Spannable with the highlighted text.

      • getHighlightedAttribute

        public static String getHighlightedAttribute(@NonNull
                                             JSONObject result,
                                             String attributeName)
        Get the highlighted version of an attribute, if there is one.
        Parameters:
        result - JSONObject describing a hit.
        attributeName - the name of the attribute to return highlighted.
        Returns:
        the highlighted version of this attribute if there is one, else the raw attribute.
